subject: Missing motor
description_text:
Hello simsonn team.
I still didn't receive any information about my missing vam pro motor. 

I ordered 2x VAM and 1x VAM Pro motors 
However i only received the 2x VAM Motors with the VAM Pro motor missing

Order number: #SSN3329

conversations.body_text: Hi Tobias Heitmeier,    We sincerely apologize for the delay in addressing your issue. The warehouse did indeed omit your order. We have arranged for a replacement shipment to be sent to you. Here is your tracking link:  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=SF6047255451853
